Literature.Title: Fine-tuning the antimicrobial activity of β-hairpin peptides with fluorinated amino acids.
Literature.Author: Chowdhary S, Pelzer T, Saathoff M, Quaas E, Pendl J, Fulde M, Koksch B

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=512µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=≥1024µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=≥1024µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=≥1024µg/ml),Candida albicans IMT 9655(MIC=512µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(0-10% Cytotoxicity=250µg/ml),Human lung carcinoma A549(0-10% Cytotoxicity=250µg/ml)
